text: Military chocolate has been a part of U.S. armed forces rations since 1937, and is issued to troops as part of basic field rations and sundry packs. Chocolate rations served two purposes: as a morale boost, and as a high- energy, pocket-sized emergency ration. ==Other websites== * Hershey Archives -- Ration D Bar * Hershey Archives -- Tropical Bar History Category:American food Category:Military of the United States Category:1937 establishments in the United States
title: United States military chocolate
